content.rendered:
Directed by Nikhil Bhat

Written by Nikhil Bhat. Kuldeep Ruhil.

Star Sunny Kaushal (Daddu Thakur). Nushrratt Bharuccha (Jhullan (as Nushrat Bharucha)). Vijay Varma (Loha Singh). Viraj Kapoor (Young Daddu Thakur). Shivam Mishra (Anurag). Anupam Mishra (College student)

Language Hindi

Producers Shiv Chanana. Vishal Chaturvedi. Manohar P. Kanungo. Sarweshwar Karandikar. Bhushan Kumar. Sunil Dolamani Panda. Deepak Simhal. Shaailesh R Singh. Tripur Singh. Hitesh Thakkar. Alok Tripathi.

Production Karma Media And Entertainment. T-Series.
